changeSet.author: Vinisha
changeSet.comment: Add all visit types to be closed on an outcome or program state
changeSet.sql: UPDATE global_property SET property_value = 'First Stage Validation,Follow-Up Validation,Hospital' WHERE property='visits.closeOnAnOutcome.visitType(s)';

changeSet.author: Vinisha
changeSet.comment: Add concept names whose outcome is used to close configured visits
changeSet.sql: UPDATE global_property SET property_value = 'FSTG, Outcomes for 1st stage surgical validation | FUP, Outcomes for follow-up surgical validation | FV, Outcomes FV' WHERE property='visits.closeOnAnOutcome.conceptName(s)';

changeSet.author: Vinisha
changeSet.comment: Add program states whose state is used to close configured visits
changeSet.sql: UPDATE global_property SET property_value = 'Network Follow-up | Discharged' WHERE property='visits.closeOnAnOutcome.programState(s)';
